headline: CF Industries’ W. Anthony Will to Retire as President and Chief Executive Officer January 4, 2026; Christopher D. Bohn Elected Successor
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., September 08, 2025--CF Industries Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: CF), a leading manufacturer of hydrogen and nitrogen products, today announced that W. Anthony Will has informed the Company’s Board of Directors of his intention to retire as president and chief executive officer, effective January 4, 2026. Christopher D. Bohn, currently executive vice president and chief operating officer of CF Industries, has been elected to succeed Mr. Will as president and chief executive officer.
